Package sg.edu.ntu.cz2002.grp3.Controller

Class TimeManager

java.lang.Object
sg.edu.ntu.cz2002.grp3.Controller.TimeManager
public class TimeManager
extends java.lang.Object
The Class TimeManager provides time handling related static functions.
Author:
Guat Kwan, Wei Xing, Ashton, Yi Bai, Zhe Ming
